prodNameC: 聯信人類免疫缺乏病毒1型和2型抗體酵素免疫診斷試劑盒
indicationsName: 酵素免疫分析法定性測試人體血清或血漿內之ANTI-HIV1/2 ANTIBODIES,篩檢用。
ingredientsDesc: 4.45 ML 樣品稀釋液 (HIV EIA SPECIMEN DILUENT): 1 瓶 PHOSPHATE BUFFERED SALINE SOLUTION CONTAINING SURFACTANT, HEAT-TREATED NORMAL GOAT SERUM, CASEIN, AND BOVINE SERUM ALBUMIN. STORE AT 2~8°C.

3.1 ML 陰性對照 (NON-REACTIVE CONTROL):1 瓶 INACTIVATED NORMAL HUMAN SERUM, WHICH IS NON-REACTIVE FOR HEPATITIS B SURFACE ANTIGEN, HIV-1/2 ANTIBODIES, HTLV-I/II ANTIBODIES AND HEPATITIS C ANTIBODIES. CONTAINS PRESERVATIVES: 0.1% SODIUM AZIDE AND 0.01% GENTAMICIN. STORE AT 2~8°C.

2.1 ML HIV-2 弱陽性對照 (HIV-2 EIA WEAKLY REACTIVE CONTROL): 1 瓶 INACTIVATED HUMAN SERUM THAT HAS A LOW TITER OF HIV-2 ANTIBODIES, DILUTED IN NORMAL HUMAN SERUM, CONTAINING 0.1% SODIUM AZIDE AND 0.01% GENTAMICIN. ATORE AT 2~8°C.
5.30 ML 酵素結合物稀釋液 (CONIUGATE DILUENT) :1 瓶 PHOSPHATE BUFFERED SALINE SOLUTION CONTAINING SURFACTANT AND HEAT-TREATED NORMAL GOAT SERUM, WITH 0.01% GENTAMICIN AS A PRESERVATIVE. STORE AT 2~8°C.
8.150 ML 濃縮洗滌液 (WASH BUFFER CONCENTRATE, 25 X): 1 瓶 A 25 X CONCENTRATE OF PHOSPHATE BUFFERED SALINE WITH SURFACTANT. STORE AT 2~30°C.
9. 0.4 ML HIV-1/2 酵素結合物 (HIV-1/2 HRP-CONJUGATE): 1 瓶 HORSERADISH PEROXIDASE-CONJUGATED GOAT ANTI-HUMAN IGG ANTIBODIES, WITH 0.01% GENTAMICIN AND 0.05% 4-DIMETHYLAMINOANTIPYRINE. STORE AT 2~8°C.
6.25 ML TMB 受質溶液(TMB SUBSTRATE SOLUTION): 1 瓶 3,3',5,5,-TETRAMETHYLBENZIDINE (TMB)DISSOLVED IN CITRATE-PHOSPHATE BUFFER AND H2O2 SOLUTION. STORE AT 2~8°C.
7.25 ML 終止液 (STOP SOLUTION): 1 瓶 DILUTED SULFURIC ACID SOLUTION (1.0M H2SO4). STORE AT 2~30°C.
10.96 孔 HIV-1/2 反應盤 (HIV-1/2 PLATE, 96 WELLS): 2 盤 EACH PLATE WELL CONTAINS ADSORBED SYNTHETIC HIV-1, HIV-2, AND HIV-1 SUBTYPE O PEPTIDES. STORE AT 2~8°C SEALED WITH SEDICCANT.

1.1 ML HIV-1 強陽性對照 (HIV-1 EIA STRONGLY REACTIVE CONTROL): 1 瓶 INACTIVATED NORMAL HUMAN SERUM THAT HAS A HIGH TITER OF HIV-1 ANTIBODIES, DILUTED IN NORMAL HUMAN SERUM, CONTAINING 0.1% SODIUM AZIDE AND 0.01% GENTAMICIN AS PRESERVATIVES. STORE AT 2~8°C.
applicantName: 永信藥品工業股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 台中縣大甲鎮中山路一段１１９１號
